item.title: Aggregating data with Rx.concatMapEager
item.description: Sometimes, we have the need of aggregating data at read time. The situation could be that we are developing in client side without proper APIs, or maybe our developing context is a backend service without all the needed information. Let’s imagine the next scenario: We have the Follower entity: Follower id name We can obtain our followers by using our FollowersRepository, but, we want to return to our clients something like:
